title: How to Check a PlayStation Plus Expiration Date on a PC
category_hierarchy: Video Game Console Maintenance and Repair

steps.headline: Go to https://store.playstation.com/en-us/subscriptions.
steps.description: You can use any web browser on your computer to check your account status.

steps.headline: Sign in.
steps.description: Click the Sign In link at the top-right corner of the page if you're not already logged in to your account, and use your Sony Entertainment email address and password to log in. If you forgot your login info, click Trouble Signing In for help. If you're already signed in, your subscription information will appear automatically upon visiting the link.

steps.headline: Find your PlayStation Plus expiration date.
steps.description: You'll see the subscription's expiration date listed in the detail box.

text: Go to https://store.playstation.com/en-us/subscriptions. You can use any web browser on your computer to check your account status. Sign in. Click the Sign In link at the top-right corner of the page if you're not already logged in to your account, and use your Sony Entertainment email address and password to log in. If you forgot your login info, click Trouble Signing In for help. If you're already signed in, your subscription information will appear automatically upon visiting the link. Find your PlayStation Plus expiration date. You'll see the subscription's expiration date listed in the detail box.
